abstract.p: Check Point Software Technologies will split stock 2-for-1 on July 25, payable to shareholders of record as of July 14 (S)

block.p: CHECK POINT SOFTWARE TECHNOLOGIES, Redwood City, Calif., which provides software to make Internet transactions secure and protect computer networks from outside invasion, said it would split its stock 2 for 1 on July 25 to shareholders of record as of July 14.

CHECK POINT SOFTWARE TECHNOLOGIES, Redwood City, Calif., which provides software to make Internet transactions secure and protect computer networks from outside invasion, said it would split its stock 2 for 1 on July 25 to shareholders of record as of July 14.

BIO-RAD LABORATORIES INC., Hercules, Calif., which makes and sells clinical diagnostics systems and instruments used in life sciences research, said it had agreed to sell certain assets of its semiconductor and opto-electronic metrology business, which is in York, England, to Accent Semiconductor Technologies, which is owned by a group of investors in California. Financial terms were not disclosed.
